name: Rakibul Hasan
review: Just right for what I needed. I donâ€™t game or stream movies. I just needed a new laptop to check email, save docs, and print, etc. For the price this is a nice laptop.

name: Reshat Kabir
review: This one is great for the price - boots up fast, runs programs smoothly, and has a fingerprint scanner for quick log in. Comes with Windows 11 which has been fine so far. The backlight keyboard is really helpful in low light.

name: Yeasin Reza
review: I recommend against this computer and Celeron processors in general. They're just at the bottom in the totem-pole. For Windows 11 or even 10.

name: Ahmed Hasan
review: I like it so much, the keyboard is from heaven, so responsive, with backlit, the processor is a monster, the GPU is enough, and more. really for 470 USD on Black Friday, is worth every penny.

name: Shifat Apon
review: Was bought for my son. He loves it. It's exactly what he wanted. It much better quality than his last laptop. Also have reasonable price and good services.

name: Rayhan Hossan
review: Physically very lightweight and very quiet (fans hardly ever kick in, and when they do, they're almost silent). it has a plastic body, but they make up for this by using a very attractive deep blue color.
